summary: The heart-warming romance story between Kyungjin and Myungwoo. Even though he has passed away, he will be always with Kyungwoo forever.
cast: Jun Ji-Hyun|Jang Hyuk|Soo-Ro Kim|Ki-woo Lee|Ye-jin Im|Kim Chang-wan|Tae-Hyun Cha|Jeong Ho-bin|Jae-hyeong Jeon|Dae-Hoon Jeong|Oh Jeong-Se|Jeong-tae Kim|Jeong-hun Lee|Yoon-hee Park|Yeong-Soon Son
title: Nae yeojachingureul sogae habnida
